question: Which statement best describes the position of the Sun at sunrise and sunset as seen by an observer in northern hemisphere on June 21?

choices.label: The Sun rises north of due east and sets north of due west.
The Sun rises south of due east and sets south of due west.
The Sun rises north of due east and sets south of due west.
The Sun rises south of due east and sets north of due west.
The Sun rises due east and sets due west.
